Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ftp

Class FTPFileInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ftp.FTPFileInfo
  • public class FTPFileInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents metadata about a file or directory in the FTP file system. This class abstracts file system details from the FTP protocol implementation, allowing handlers to work with various storage backends (filesystem, database, etc.).
    Author:
    Chris Burdess

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      FTPFileInfo​(java.lang.String name, long size, java.time.Instant lastModified, java.lang.String owner, java.lang.String group, java.lang.String permissions)
      Creates file information for a regular file.
      FTPFileInfo​(java.lang.String name, java.time.Instant lastModified, java.lang.String owner, java.lang.String group, java.lang.String permissions)
      Creates file information for a directory.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FTPFileInfo

        public FTPFileInfo​(java.lang.String name,
                   long size,
                   java.time.Instant lastModified,
                   java.lang.String owner,
                   java.lang.String group,
                   java.lang.String permissions)
        Creates file information for a regular file.
        Parameters:
        name - the file name
        size - the file size in bytes
        lastModified - when the file was last modified
        owner - the file owner (can be null)
        group - the file group (can be null)
        permissions - Unix-style permissions string (e.g., "rw-r--r--")

      • FTPFileInfo

        public FTPFileInfo​(java.lang.String name,
                   java.time.Instant lastModified,
                   java.lang.String owner,
                   java.lang.String group,
                   java.lang.String permissions)
        Creates file information for a directory.
        Parameters:
        name - the directory name
        lastModified - when the directory was last modified
        owner - the directory owner (can be null)
        group - the directory group (can be null)
        permissions - Unix-style permissions string (e.g., "rwxr-xr-x")

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        the file or directory name

      • isDirectory

        public boolean isDirectory()
        Returns:
        true if this represents a directory, false for a regular file

      • isFile

        public boolean isFile()
        Returns:
        true if this represents a regular file, false for a directory

      • getSize

        public long getSize()
        Returns:
        the file size in bytes (0 for directories)

      • getLastModified

        public java.time.Instant getLastModified()
        Returns:
        when the file or directory was last modified

      • getOwner

        public java.lang.String getOwner()
        Returns:
        the owner name, or null if not available

      • getGroup

        public java.lang.String getGroup()
        Returns:
        the group name, or null if not available

      • getPermissions

        public java.lang.String getPermissions()
        Returns:
        Unix-style permissions string (e.g., "rw-r--r--"), or null if not available

      • formatAsListingLine

        public java.lang.String formatAsListingLine()
        Formats this file info as a Unix-style directory listing line. Used for FTP LIST command responses.
        Returns:
        formatted listing line (e.g., "-rw-r--r-- 1 user group 1234 Jan 15 10:30 filename.txt")

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
